Monitor a Socket for Pipe Changes

Source: R/socket.R
monitor.Rd

This function monitors pipe additions and removals from a socket.

Usage

monitor(sock, cv)

read_monitor(x)

Arguments

sock

a Socket.

cv

a 'conditionVariable'.

x

a Monitor.

Value

For monitor: a Monitor (object of class 'nanoMonitor').
For read_monitor: an integer vector of pipe IDs (positive if added, negative if removed), or else NULL if there were no changes since the previous read.

Examples

cv <- cv()
s <- socket("poly")
s1 <- socket("poly")

m <- monitor(s, cv)
m
#> < nanoMonitor >
#>  - socket: 14

listen(s)
dial(s1)

cv_value(cv)
#> [1] 1
read_monitor(m)
#> [1] 326591521

close(s)
close(s1)

read_monitor(m)
#> [1] -326591521
